description: From the Ancient Greek ἵππος (híppos, “horse”) + τίγρις (tígris, “tiger”), describing a 'tiger-like striped' equine,  +‎ -ine.

adjectives.description: hippotigrine (comparative more hippotigrine, superlative most hippotigrine)

examples: Hippotigrine black and white stripe patterns are fairly popular on cushions and furniture
